newsitem.title: JAPAN: MOF says no more debt-laden banks in W.Japan - Kyodo.
newsitem.headline: MOF says no more debt-laden banks in W.Japan - Kyodo.

text.p: A Ministry of Finance official said on Thursday that he did not think there were any more debt-ridden banks like Hanwa Bank Ltd in western Japan, the Kyodo news agency reported.
Asked about the health of financial institutions in western Japan, an official at MOF's branch office there was quoted as saying: "There are no firms which are facing a situation like Hanwa Bank."
MOF ordered Hanwa Bank, a regional bank in western Japan, to halt most of its business on Thursday because the bank was unable to recover bad loans.
